attributes.additional_details: It doesn't just affect animals and no one is listening
attributes.background:
To change the usage of fireworks. I'm a pet person but it doesn't just affect them there's children, OAP's, Veterans and alot of others who just dislike them.
Its not a joke anymore and something needs doing. 
If you want evidence then make sure you have plenty of time to watch it.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Limit the Sale and Use of Fireworks to Organisers of Licensed Displays Only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891

Review and reduce the decibel limit on fireworks sold to the public: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

Ban all firework sales except the days of November 5th And January 31st: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555746

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448

Require 1 week's notice be given of any use of fireworks in a residential area: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332906

Ban the release of fireworks after 10pm, including on bonfire night: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557153

Make it illegal for fireworks to be set off on days other than Nov 5 and Dec 31: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559397
